message.original: 我が、主―― 私を救出に――？
message.translation: Master! You have come to rescue me?

message.original: 雇用ならば、しかるべき手順で
message.translation: If it is your will. It shall be done.

message.original: 覚者よ、リムストーンにて あなたの指名を待つ
message.translation: At the Riftstone, we await your choosing.
We march upon the battlefield together.

message.original: 私なら、貴方の善き盾となれると信じる
私への用命あらば、ただちに取りかかる
message.translation: Any requests, and I will see them through, Arisen.

message.original: 我が主、任務と指示を待つ
製作か戦闘か、私にも役割を――
message.Translation: I specialize in combat and crafting.

message.original: 鋭意製作中――作業に遅延なし
message.translation: I will work carefully and quickly.

message.original: 作業完了まで、もうしばし猶予を
message.translation: Please wait awhile, until the task is complete.

message.original: ――くっ より技術を磨き、さらに生産効率を 上げなければ
message.translation: I must improve my refining ability. I must increase my production efficiency as well.

message.original: こんな無様を――許していただきたい
message.translation: I am sorry for the delay. Please forgive me.

message.original: 我が主――！ 償いは、次の戦いの場で――！
message.translation: Arisen! We will be victorious in our next battle!

message.original: 私の力不足、恥じる他はない―― この経験を次の糧に――
